resources.string: How much do I love you?
Strike! Careful, we are about to brake up!
How can you do that to me! Maybe your not the one I thought!
Grr… but why did you do that? Do you still love me?
Sometimes, you really irritate me, but I still love you!
You can be thankful to your angel face! You are too cute to be angry at!
All this little things that brighten up my days and my life! Thanks for your little attentions my sweetie!
You did great! If this was our first date, I will definitely go for a second one with you! I like you… a lot!
For the most wonderful person in my life! You make me happy!
You are definitely the one for me “Mon Amour”! When are we moving in together?
Would you marry me?! :-D Just kidding ! I love you to infinity and beyond!
When satisfy with the score click here
Click here to take a screenshot, then send it by MMS to your loved one!
To send the screenshot to your Lover, you need the File Manager application:
In File Manager, go to the emulated folder, click on 0, then on the Download folder. Click 3 seconds on your file screenshot.png and choose the option Send
Want to change the Barometer value?
